thread.title: Ambassador Reveals How Obama Undermined Israel
thread.title_full: Ambassador Reveals How Obama Undermined Israel

author: bilelloj
title: Ambassador Reveals How Obama Undermined Israel
text:
Ambassador Reveals How Obama Undermined Israel Published June 21, 2015 AP 
By Larry Getlen, NY Post 
On Nov. 8, 2011, President Obama met with then-French President Nicolas Sarkozy in Cannes after what had been a particularly rough week for US-Israeli relations.The week prior, the UN agency UNESCO admitted Palestine as a member state. Congress responded by cutting off UNESCOâ€™s funding, a move the Obama administration direly opposed.
